filters.sql: SELECT segment, COUNT(*) FROM sales_data {{ filters | where }} GROUP BY segment ORDER BY segment ASC LIMIT 50
filters.title: Segment

filters.sql: SELECT state, COUNT(*) FROM sales_data {{ filters | where }} GROUP BY state ORDER BY state ASC LIMIT 50
filters.title: State

filters.sql: SELECT min(ship_date) as min, max(ship_date) as max FROM sales_data {{ filters | where }}
filters.title: Ship Date

cards.description: Distribution of customer orders by shipping preference.
cards.sql: SELECT ship_mode, COUNT(*) FROM sales_data  {{ filters | where }} GROUP BY  ship_mode ORDER BY  ship_mode DESC LIMIT 100
cards.title: Orders by Ship Mode

cards.description: Count of orders by segment, stacked by class.
cards.sql: SELECT region, ship_mode, COUNT(*) FROM sales_data  {{ filters | where }} GROUP BY region, ship_mode ORDER BY region, ship_mode DESC LIMIT 100
cards.title: Orders by Segment and Class
